ABOUT

Just a man on journey with a passion for coding.

I've been on the path of learning web development for little over a year now. After beginning my journey with TOP, I immediately grew the passion for coding. From my first landing page all the way to completing a certified course from MIT. I believe that the path of software engineering is my calling & I hope to someday land a role in the industry.

I am currently only well-versed in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, & Python. I've recently been giving more focus into computer science & have enrolled into a course for AI using python.
